alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 03 at 8:54AM PDT until July 03 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Gusty north winds and very dry conditions Monday... Very dry conditions with combine with breezy to gusty northerly winds on Monday through the Okanogan Valley, Waterville Plateau, and Western Columbia Basin. New fire starts will have the potential to spread rapidly. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE OKANOGAN VALLEY AND WATERVILLE PLATEAU... * Affected Area: Fire Weather Zone 703 Okanogan Valley (Zone 703) and Fire Weather Zone 706 Waterville Plateau (Zone 706). * Winds: North 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. Local gusts to 40 mph. * Relative Humidities: 10 to 20 percent. * Impacts: Rapid fire spread with any new fire starts. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
